Object.Field:
COMPONENT NAME: RKM Oracle
AUTHOR: Oracle
DESCRIPTION This KM retrieves the table and view structures in Oracle (columns, primary keys, alternate keys and references). This KM works for Oracle databases for Oracle versions 7.3 and later. This KM retreive also the Partition and Sub partition
REQUIREMENTS Required privileges for the connection user: SELECT on any dictionnary view ALL_* (eg. ALL_TABLES)
LIMITATIONS - When reversing tables/view at the same time as synonyms, user must not include synonyms, which point to tables/views, which are already in the model or which are also included for current reverse engineering run. This may lead to unique constraint violations e.g. for FK names.
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - COMPATIBLE: Enable different features depending on the version of the reversed database - VAIDATE: Enable an automatic validation of the options specified for the KM - ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT: enable possible use of editioning views

This option enables the reverse of INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND and INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH datatypes.
Values INTERVAL types reversed 9 Yes 8 No
It is recommended to use 9 on Oracle 9i and above.
This option generates an extra validation step during development. Validations performed are: - validation of KM option COMPATIBLE - validation of KM option SHORTCUT_HANDLING_MODE

In case you use this RKM in an Oracle DB 11R2 or later environment with Editions activated and data is accessed through editioning views instead of directly through tables, you should consider activating this option. Please see KM reference guide for details.

This mode will be applied to the cases where the base table of a shortcut does not match the database table.
This option has three possible values: · ALWAYS_MATERIALIZE: Always materialize conflicted shortcuts. (default) · ALWAYS_SKIP: Always skip conflicted shortcuts. · PROMPT: Prompt

insert into SNP_REV_PARTITION ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, PAR_PARTITION_NAME, PARTITION_DESC ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :SUBPARTITION_NAME, :PARTITION_NAME, :PART_DESC )

select TABLE_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, SUBPARTITION_NAME, HIGH_VALUE PART_DESC from ALL_TAB_SUBPARTITIONS where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and TABLE_OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_PARTITION ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, PAR_PARTITION_NAME, PARTITION_DESC ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :SUBPARTITION_NAME, :PARTITION_NAME, :PART_DESC )

SELECT SY.SYNONYM_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, SUBPARTITION_NAME, HIGH_VALUE PART_DESC from ALL_TAB_SUBPARTITIONS ATP JOIN ALL_SYNONYMS SY ON ( sY.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ATP.TABLE_OWNER = SY.TABLE_OWNER and ATP.TABLE_NAME = SY.TABLE_NAME ) where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0

insert into SNP_REV_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, COL_NAME, DT_DRIVER, COL_HEADING, COL_DESC_C, POS, LONGC, SCALEC, COL_MANDATORY, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :COL_NAME, :DT_DRIVER, :COL_HEADING, :COL_DESC, :POS, :LONGC, :SCALEC, :COL_MANDATORY, '1', '1' )

select c.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, c.COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME, <% if ("8".equals(odiRef.getOption ("COMPATIBLE"))) {%> c.DATA_TYPE DT_DRIVER, <% } else { %> case when c.DATA_TYPE like 'INTERVAL DAY(%) TO SECOND(%)' then 'INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'INTERVAL YEAR(%) TO MONTH' then 'INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0)' then 'TIMESTAMP(0)' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)' then 'TIMESTAMP' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%) WITH TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' else c.DATA_TYPE end DT_DRIVER, <% } %> substr(c.COLUMN_NAME,1,35) COL_HEADING, cc.COMMENTS COL_DESC, c.COLUMN_ID POS, case when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' then c.DATA_PRECISION when C.DATA_TYPE = 'CHAR' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NCHAR' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'VARCHAR2' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NVARCHAR2' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)%' then c.DATA_SCALE when c.DATA_TYPE = 'DATE' then NULL else nvl(c.DATA_PRECISION,c.DATA_LENGTH) end LONGC, case when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)%' then NULL else c.DATA_SCALE end SCALEC, decode(c.NULLABLE,'Y','0','1') COL_MANDATORY from ALL_TAB_COLUMNS c, ALL_COL_COMMENTS cc, ALL_OBJECTS o Where o.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and ( ( o.OBJECT_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and o.OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 ) or ( o.OBJECT_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and o.OBJECT_TYPE = 'VIEW' and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 ) ) and cc.OWNER(+) = c.OWNER and cc.TABLE_NAME(+) = c.TABLE_NAME and cc.COLUMN_NAME(+) = c.COLUMN_NAME and o.OWNER = c.OWNER and o.OBJECT_NAME = c.TABLE_NAME UNION select SY.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, c.COLUMN_NAME COL_NAME, <% if ("8".equals(odiRef.getOption ("COMPATIBLE"))) {%> c.DATA_TYPE DT_DRIVER, <% } else { %> case when c.DATA_TYPE like 'INTERVAL DAY(%) TO SECOND(%)' then 'INTERVAL DAY TO SECOND' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'INTERVAL YEAR(%) TO MONTH' then 'INTERVAL YEAR TO MONTH' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0)' then 'TIMESTAMP(0)' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)' then 'TIMESTAMP' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%) WITH TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP(0) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%) WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' then 'TIMESTAMP WITH LOCAL TIME ZONE' else c.DATA_TYPE end DT_DRIVER, <% } %> substr(c.COLUMN_NAME,1,35) COL_HEADING, cc.COMMENTS COL_DESC, c.COLUMN_ID POS, case when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' then c.DATA_PRECISION when C.DATA_TYPE = 'CHAR' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NCHAR' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'VARCHAR2' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when C.DATA_TYPE = 'NVARCHAR2' then c.CHAR_LENGTH when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)%' then c.DATA_SCALE else nvl(c.DATA_PRECISION,c.DATA_LENGTH) end LONGC, case when c.DATA_TYPE like 'TIMESTAMP(%)%' then NULL else c.DATA_SCALE end SCALEC, decode(c.NULLABLE,'Y','0','1') COL_MANDATORY from ALL_TAB_COLUMNS c, ALL_COL_COMMENTS cc, ALL_SYNONYMS SY Where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and SY.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and C.OWNER = SY.TABLE_OWNER and C.TABLE_NAME = SY.TABLE_NAME and cc.OWNER(+) = C.OWNER and cc.TABLE_NAME(+) = C.TABLE_NAME and cc.COLUMN_NAME(+) = C.COLUMN_NAME

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN ( MOD_GUID, FK_NAME, TABLE_NAME, FK_TYPE, PK_SCHEMA, PK_TABLE_NAME, CHECK_STAT, CHECK_FLOW, IND_ACTIVE, DEL_RULE, UPD_RULE ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :FK_NAME, :TABLE_NAME, 'D', :SCHEMA_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, '1', '1', :STATUS, :DEL_RULE, 'R' )

select fk.owner FK_USER_NAME, fk.table_name TABLE_NAME, fk.constraint_name FK_NAME, pk.owner PK_USER_NAME, pk.table_name PK_TABLE_NAME, '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' SCHEMA_NAME, NVL(SUBSTR(FK.DELETE_RULE,1,1),'R') DEL_RULE, Decode(pk.status,'ENABLED','1','DISABLED','0') STATUS From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk where (instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 or instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0) and fk.constraint_type ='R' and fk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and fk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name <% if ((odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT")).equals("1")) { /* retrieve FK constraints defined on the base table of an EV as a FK constraint of the EV itself */ %> and not exists ( select 'X' From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk, all_editioning_views ev where fk.constraint_type ='R' and fk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and fk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and fk.owner(+) = ev.owner and fk.table_name = ev.table_name ) union select fk.owner FK_USER_NAME, ev.view_name TABLE_NAME, fk.constraint_name FK_NAME, pk.owner PK_USER_NAME, pk.table_name PK_TABLE_NAME, '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' SCHEMA_NAME, NVL(SUBSTR(FK.DELETE_RULE,1,1), 'R') DEL_RULE, Decode(pk.status,'ENABLED','1','DISABLED','0') STATUS From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk, all_editioning_views ev where fk.constraint_type ='R' and fk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and fk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and fk.owner(+) = ev.owner and fk.table_name = ev.table_name <% } %> union select fk.owner FK_USER_NAME, sfk.synonym_name TABLE_NAME, fk.constraint_name FK_NAME, pk.owner PK_USER_NAME, spk.synonym_name PK_TABLE_NAME, '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' SCHEMA_NAME, NVL(SUBSTR(FK.DELETE_RULE,1,1),'R') DEL_RULE, Decode(pk.status,'ENABLED','1','DISABLED','0') STATUS From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk, all_synonyms sfk, all_synonyms spk where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and fk.constraint_type ='R' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and sfk.owner = spk.owner and sfk.table_owner = fk.owner and sfk.table_name = fk.table_name and spk.table_owner = pk.owner and spk.table_name = pk.table_name and sfk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and sfk.synonym_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and spk.synonym_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

Select table_name CK_TABLE_NAME, constraint_name CK_NAME, search_condition CK_COND From all_constraints c where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and c.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.constraint_type ='C' and constraint_name not like 'SYS%'

insert into SNP_REV_JOIN_COL ( MOD_GUID, FK_NAME, FK_COL_NAME, FK_TABLE_NAME, PK_COL_NAME, PK_TABLE_NAME, POS ) Values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :FK_NAME, :FK_COL_NAME, :FK_TABLE_NAME, :PK_COL_NAME, :PK_TABLE_NAME, :POS )

select fk.table_name FK_TABLE_NAME, pkc.table_name PK_TABLE_NAME, fk.constraint_name FK_NAME, substr(fkc.column_name,1,35) FK_COL_NAME, pkc.column_name PK_COL_NAME, fkc.position POS From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk, all_cons_columns fkc, all_cons_columns pkc where (instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 or instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0) and fk.constraint_type = 'R' and fk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and fk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and pkc.owner = fk.r_owner and pkc.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and pkc.position = fkc.position and fkc.owner = fk.owner and fkc.constraint_name = fk.constraint_name <% if ((odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT")).equals("1")) { %> and not exists ( select 'X' From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk, all_cons_columns fkc, all_cons_columns pkc, all_editioning_views ev, all_editioning_view_cols evcol where fk.constraint_type = 'R' and fk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and fk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and pkc.owner = fk.r_owner and pkc.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and pkc.position = fkc.position and fkc.owner = fk.owner and fkc.constraint_name = fk.constraint_name and fk.owner(+) = ev.owner and fk.table_name = ev.table_name and evcol.owner(+) = ev.owner and evcol.table_column_name = fkc.column_name ) union select ev.view_name FK_TABLE_NAME, pkc.table_name PK_TABLE_NAME, fk.constraint_name FK_NAME, substr(fkc.column_name,1,35) FK_COL_NAME, pkc.column_name PK_COL_NAME, fkc.position POS From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk, all_cons_columns fkc, all_cons_columns pkc, all_editioning_views ev, all_editioning_view_cols evcol where fk.constraint_type = 'R' and fk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and fk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and pkc.owner = fk.r_owner and pkc.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and pkc.position = fkc.position and fkc.owner = fk.owner and fkc.constraint_name = fk.constraint_name and fk.owner(+) = ev.owner and fk.table_name = ev.table_name and evcol.owner(+) = ev.owner and evcol.table_column_name = fkc.column_name <% } %> union select sfk.synonym_name TABLE_NAME, spk.synonym_name PK_TABLE_NAME, fk.constraint_name FK_NAME, substr(fkc.column_name,1,35) FK_COL_NAME, pkc.column_name PK_COL_NAME, fkc.position POS From all_constraints fk, all_constraints pk, all_synonyms sfk, all_synonyms spk, all_cons_columns fkc, all_cons_columns pkc where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and fk.constraint_type ='R' and pk.owner = fk.r_owner and pk.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and sfk.owner = spk.owner and sfk.table_owner = fk.owner and sfk.table_name = fk.table_name and spk.table_owner = pk.owner and spk.table_name = pk.table_name and pkc.owner = fk.r_owner and pkc.constraint_name = fk.r_constraint_name and pkc.position = fkc.position and fkc.owner = fk.owner and fkc.constraint_name = fk.constraint_name and sfk.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and sfk.synonym_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and spk.synonym_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

insert into SNP_REV_KEY ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT ) Values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, :STATUS, '1', '1' )

<% /* first select for PK on table */ %> Select c.table_name TABLE_NAME, Decode(c.constraint_type,'P','PK','U','AK') CONS_TYPE, c.constraint_name KEY_NAME, Decode(c.status,'ENABLED','1','DISABLED','0') STATUS From all_constraints c where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and c.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') <% if ((odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT")).equals("1")) { /* when using editioning views, avoid reverse here the EV PK */ %> and c.status = 'ENABLED' <% } %> union Select SY.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, Decode(c.constraint_type,'P','PK','U','AK') CONS_TYPE, c.constraint_name KEY_NAME, Decode(c.status,'ENABLED','1','DISABLED','0') STATUS From all_constraints c, ALL_SYNONYMS SY Where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and SY.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.owner = SY.TABLE_OWNER and c.table_name = SY.TABLE_NAME and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') <% if ((odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT")).equals("1")) { /* reverse PK defined on base table if this select is modified, do not forget the not exists in the next union below */ %> union Select ev.view_name TABLE_NAME, Decode(c.constraint_type,'P','PK','U','AK') CONS_TYPE, c.constraint_name KEY_NAME, Decode(c.status,'ENABLED','1','DISABLED','0') STATUS From all_constraints c, all_editioning_views ev where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 and c.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') and c.owner(+) = ev.owner and c.table_name = ev.table_name union <% /* reverse PK on EV if nothing on the base table */ %> Select c.table_name TABLE_NAME, Decode(c.constraint_type,'P','PK','U','AK') CONS_TYPE, c.constraint_name KEY_NAME, Decode(c.status,'ENABLED','1','DISABLED','0') STATUS From all_constraints c where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 and c.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') and c.status = 'DISABLED' and not exists ( Select 'X' From all_constraints c, all_editioning_views ev where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 and c.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and c.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') and c.owner(+) = ev.owner and c.table_name = ev.table_name ) <% } %>
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS ) Values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS )

Select c.table_name TABLE_NAME, co.constraint_name KEY_NAME, co.column_name COL_NAME, co.position POS From all_cons_columns co, all_constraints c where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and co.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and co.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and co.owner = c.owner and co.table_name = c.table_name and co.owner = c.owner and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') and co.constraint_name = c.constraint_name UNION Select SY.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, co.constraint_name KEY_NAME, co.column_name COL_NAME, co.position POS From all_cons_columns co, all_constraints c, ALL_SYNONYMS SY Where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and SY.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.owner = SY.TABLE_OWNER and c.table_name = SY.TABLE_NAME and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') and co.owner = c.owner and co.table_name = c.table_name <% if ((odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT")).equals("1")) { %> UNION Select ev.view_name TABLE_NAME, co.constraint_name KEY_NAME, evcol.view_column_name COL_NAME, co.position POS From all_cons_columns co, all_constraints c, all_editioning_views ev, all_editioning_view_cols evcol where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 and co.owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and co.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and co.owner = c.owner and co.table_name = c.table_name and co.owner = c.owner and c.constraint_type in ('P','U') and co.constraint_name = c.constraint_name and c.owner(+) = ev.owner and c.table_name = ev.table_name and evcol.owner(+) = ev.owner and evcol.table_column_name = co.column_name <% } %>

insert into SNP_REV_KEY ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, CONS_TYPE, IND_ACTIVE, CHECK_FLOW, CHECK_STAT ) Values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :CONS_TYPE, '1', '1', '1' )

Select i.table_name TABLE_NAME, i.index_name KEY_NAME, decode(i.UNIQUENESS,'UNIQUE','AK','I') CONS_TYPE From all_indexes i where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and i.TABLE_OWNER ='<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and I.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and not exists ( select 'X' from all_constraints c where c.owner = i.table_owner and c.table_name = i.table_name and c.constraint_name = i.index_name and c.constraint_type in ('U','P') ) union Select SY.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, i.index_name KEY_NAME, decode(i.UNIQUENESS,'UNIQUE','AK','I') CONS_TYPE From all_indexes i, all_synonyms sy where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and SY.OWNER ='<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and SY.TABLE_OWNER = i.TABLE_OWNER and SY.TABLE_NAME = i.TABLE_NAME and not exists ( select 'X' from all_constraints c where c.owner = i.table_owner and c.table_name = i.table_name and c.constraint_name = i.index_name and c.constraint_type in ('U','P') ) <% if ((odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT")).equals("1")) { /* retrieve uniqueness constraints defined on the base table of an EV as an AK constraint of the EV itself */ %> union Select i.table_name TABLE_NAME, i.index_name KEY_NAME, decode(i.UNIQUENESS,'UNIQUE','AK','I') CONS_TYPE From all_indexes i, all_editioning_views ev where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and i.TABLE_OWNER ='<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and I.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and i.table_name = ev.table_name and i.owner(+) = ev.owner and not exists ( select 'X' from all_constraints c where c.owner = i.table_owner and c.table_name = ev.table_name and c.constraint_name = i.index_name and c.constraint_type in ('U','P') ) <% } %>
Get columns for keys from indexes
insert into SNP_REV_KEY_COL ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, KEY_NAME, COL_NAME, POS ) Values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :KEY_NAME, :COL_NAME, :POS )

Select ic.table_name TABLE_NAME, ic.index_name KEY_NAME, ic.column_name COL_NAME, ic.column_position POS From all_ind_columns ic, all_indexes i where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and ic.index_owner = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and ic.table_name like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ic.TABLE_owner = i.TABLE_OWNER and ic.table_name = i.table_name and ic.index_name = i.index_name and not exists ( select 'X' from all_constraints c Where c.owner = i.table_owner and c.table_name = i.table_name and c.constraint_name = i.index_name and c.constraint_type in ('U','P') ) union Select SY.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, i.index_name KEY_NAME, ic.column_name COL_NAME, ic.column_position POS From all_ind_columns ic, all_indexes i, all_synonyms SY where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and SY.OWNER ='<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and SY.TABLE_OWNER = i.TABLE_OWNER and SY.TABLE_NAME = i.TABLE_NAME and ic.TABLE_owner = i.TABLE_OWNER and ic.table_name = i.table_name and ic.index_name = i.index_name and not exists ( select 'X' from all_constraints c where c.owner = i.table_owner and c.table_name = i.table_name and c.constraint_name = i.index_name and c.constraint_type in ('U','P') )

insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, RES_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_TYPE, TABLE_DESC_C, IND_SHOW, R_COUNT, PARTITION_METH, SUB_PARTITION_METH ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :RES_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, :TABLE_TYPE, :TABLE_DESC, '1', :R_COUNT, :PARTITIONING_TYPE, :SUBPARTITIONING_TYPE
)

Select t.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, t.TABLE_NAME RES_NAME, replace(t.TABLE_NAME,'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>','') TABLE_ALIAS, tc.COMMENTS TABLE_DESC, 'T' TABLE_TYPE, t.NUM_ROWS R_COUNT, SUBSTR(PARTITIONING_TYPE ,1,1) PARTITIONING_TYPE, SUBSTR(SUBPARTITIONING_TYPE,1,1) SUBPARTITIONING_TYPE From ALL_TABLES t, ALL_TAB_COMMENTS tc, ALL_PART_TABLES tp Where t.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and t.TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and tc.OWNER(+) = t.OWNER and tc.TABLE_NAME(+) = t.TABLE_NAME and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and tp.OWNER(+) = t.OWNER and tp.TABLE_NAME(+) = t.TABLE_NAME <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")) {%> and not exists (select 'X' from ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS ev where ev.OWNER = t.OWNER and ev.TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME) <% } %> union Select s.SYNONYM_NAME TABLE_NAME, s.SYNONYM_NAME RES_NAME, replace(s.SYNONYM_NAME,'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>','') TABLE_ALIAS, '<<SYNONYM FOR TABLE: ' || T.OWNER || '.' || T.TABLE_NAME || '>> ' || tc.COMMENTS TABLE_DESC, 'SY' TABLE_TYPE, t.NUM_ROWS R_COUNT, SUBSTR(PARTITIONING_TYPE ,1,1), SUBSTR(SUBPARTITIONING_TYPE,1,1) From ALL_TABLES t, ALL_SYNONYMS s, ALL_TAB_COMMENTS tc, ALL_PART_TABLES tp Where s.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and s.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and t.OWNER = s.TABLE_OWNER and t.TABLE_NAME = s.TABLE_NAME and tc.OWNER(+) = t.OWNER and tc.TABLE_NAME(+) = t.TABLE_NAME and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and tp.OWNER(+) = t.OWNER and tp.TABLE_NAME(+) = t.TABLE_NAME <% if (odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT").equals("1")) {%> and not exists (select 'X' from ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS ev where ev.OWNER = s.OWNER and ev.TABLE_NAME = s.TABLE_NAME) <% } %>
insert into SNP_REV_PARTITION ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, PARTITION_DESC ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :PARTITION_NAME, :PART_DESC )

select TABLE_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, HIGH_VALUE PART_DESC from ALL_TAB_PARTITIONS where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';T;') > 0 and TABLE_OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and TABLE_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>'

Insert into SNP_REV_TABLE ( MOD_GUID, RES_NAME, TABLE_NAME, TABLE_ALIAS, TABLE_DESC_C, TABLE_TYPE, IND_SHOW ) Values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :RES_NAME, :TABLE_NAME, :TABLE_ALIAS, :TABLE_DESC, :TABLE_TYPE, '1' )

Select v.VIEW_NAME TABLE_NAME, v.VIEW_NAME RES_NAME, replace(v.VIEW_NAME,'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>','') TABLE_ALIAS, vc.COMMENTS TABLE_DESC, 'V' TABLE_TYPE From ALL_VIEWS v, ALL_TAB_COMMENTS vc, ALL_OBJECTS o Where v.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and v.VIEW_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and vc.OWNER(+) = v.OWNER and vc.TABLE_NAME(+) = v.VIEW_NAME and o.OWNER = v.OWNER and o.OBJECT_NAME = v.VIEW_NAME and o.OBJECT_TYPE = 'VIEW' and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 <% if ((odiRef.getOption("ENABLE_EDITION_SUPPORT")).equals("1")) { %> and not exists (select 'X' from all_editioning_views ev where ev.owner = v.owner and ev.view_name = v.view_name) union Select ev.VIEW_NAME TABLE_NAME, ev.VIEW_NAME RES_NAME, replace(ev.VIEW_NAME,'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_ALIAS_LTRIM")%>','') TABLE_ALIAS, tc.COMMENTS TABLE_DESC, 'V' TABLE_TYPE From ALL_EDITIONING_VIEWS ev, ALL_TAB_COMMENTS tc Where ev.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and ev.VIEW_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and tc.OWNER(+) = ev.OWNER and tc.TABLE_NAME(+) = ev.VIEW_NAME and instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';V;') > 0 <% } %>

Select SY.SYNONYM_NAME CK_TABLE_NAME, constraint_name CK_NAME, search_condition CK_COND From all_constraints c, ALL_SYNONYMS SY Where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0 and SY.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and c.owner = SY.TABLE_OWNER and c.table_name = SY.TABLE_NAME and c.constraint_type = 'C' and constraint_name not like 'SYS%'
insert into SNP_REV_PARTITION ( MOD_GUID, TABLE_NAME, PARTITION_NAME, PARTITION_DESC ) values ( '<%=odiRef.getModel("GLOBAL_ID")%>', :TABLE_NAME, :PARTITION_NAME, :PART_DESC )

SELECT SY.SYNONYM_NAME, ATP.PARTITION_NAME, HIGH_VALUE from ALL_TAB_PARTITIONS ATP JOIN ALL_SYNONYMS SY ON ( sY.OWNER = '<%=odiRef.getModel("SCHEMA_NAME")%>' and SY.SYNONYM_NAME like '<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_PATT")%>' and ATP.TABLE_OWNER = SY.TABLE_OWNER and ATP.TABLE_NAME = SY.TABLE_NAME ) where instr(';'||'<%=odiRef.getModel("REV_OBJ_TYPE")%>'||';', ';SY;') > 0
